sections.heading: Introduction
sections.content: Welcome to ingreed.io. These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of ingreed.io's Website.

sections.heading: Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By accessing this website we assume you accept these terms and conditions. Do not continue to use ingreed.io if you do not agree to all of the terms and conditions stated on this page.

sections.heading: License
sections.content: Unless otherwise stated, ingreed.io and/or its licensors own the intellectual property rights for all material on ingreed.io. All intellectual property rights are reserved. You may access this from ingreed.io for your own personal use subjected to restrictions set in these terms and conditions.

sections.heading: User Responsibilities
sections.content: You must not: Republish material from ingreed.io, Sell, rent or sub-license material from ingreed.io, Reproduce, duplicate or copy material from ingreed.io, Redistribute content from ingreed.io.

sections.heading: Disclaimer
sections.content: To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, we exclude all representations, warranties and conditions relating to our website and the use of this website.
